definition: to work hard without complaint (idiom)
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
to blame/to complain

sentences.english: For my dream i will grin and bear it, without complaint.
sentences.chinese: 爲了這個夢想我要任勞任怨不再滿腹牢騷。

sentences.english: Houston had worked hard for Jackson.
sentences.chinese: 休斯頓任勞任怨地爲傑克遜做事。

sentences.english: Such work attitude is worthy of study and advocation .
sentences.chinese: 這種任勞任怨的工作態度是值得我們學習和提倡的。

sentences.english: Work hard in spite of criticism the member of committee work of the class life, from personal no object gain and loss.
sentences.chinese: 對班級生活委員工作任勞任怨，從不計較個人得失。

sentences.english: Richy: What we need is someone who keeps his nose to the grindstone.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要任勞任怨，埋頭苦幹的人。

definition: making an all-out effort (idiom); to try one's heart out/to do one's utmost
to work hard/to look after
to do one's duty/to do one's bit conscientiously
selfless/impartial
lit. as sweet as syrup (idiom, from Book of Songs); to endure hardship gladly/a glutton for punishment
to bend to a task and spare no effort (idiom); striving to the utmost
to spare no effort
cautious and conscientious
lit. to spit out one's heart and spill blood (idiom)/to work one's heart out/blood, sweat and tears
to support one's family (idiom); to have difficulty feeding a family
to set an example (idiom); to serve as a model
workplace overseer/foreman
to bury oneself in work (idiom); to be engrossed in work/to make an all-out effort/up to the neck in work
diligent and attentive/assiduous/sincere
to toil/hard work
to see, hear and obey (idiom); to take advice/to take sb at his word
